But more deeply, even the artists that produce completely original works are still creating #remixes of their own experiences, beliefs, and truths. 

3/4 https://t.co/3j4fuE4MMt

When I look at digital artworks, I think that a large portion of them can be considered ‚Äúremixes‚Äù. On the surface level, most #3D artists use resources like premade models, figures, and textures to create the artworks the community sees and loves. 

2/4 https://t.co/bFRilqO4p4

From @klarens_malluta:
The purpose of this collection is to challenge pre-existing notions in the art community rather than to make a statement:

What is ‚Äúreal‚Äù art?

Is anything original?

Can traditional & digital art coexist?

Should an artwork inherently have meaning?

1/4 https://t.co/XHbniU68sT
